name: RIB office Compressed Archive
summary: Learn about .ROCA files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The RIB office database stores the application data in a .ROD file, which uses the Progress ObjectStore database format. However, when a user saves the project database in RIB office, the software generates a ROCA file.
NOTE: RIB office is used to manage engineering projects in areas such as architecture, building construction, and road construction. It is no longer available for download.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
